mapper.select: SELECT T.USER_ID "userId", T.INSTITUTION_ID "institutionId", T.TELEPHONE "telephone", T.ADDRESS "address", T.IS_DELETE "isDelete", T.WORK_TIME "workTime", T.ENTRY_TIME "entryTime", T.JOB_PROFESSION "jobProfession", T.WORK_NUMBER "workNumber", CASE WHEN A.AUDIT_STATUS = 1 THEN L.INSTITUTION_NAME ELSE '' END AS "institutionName" FROM STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_INFO_INSTITUTION T LEFT JOIN STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_COMMON_USER U ON T.USER_ID = U.USER_ID LEFT JOIN STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_ENTITY_INSTITUTION L ON L.ID = U.ORGANIZATION_ID LEFT JOIN STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_USER_AUDIT A ON A.USER_ID = T.USER_ID WHERE T.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT to_char(sei.ID) AS ID, scu.USER_ID, sei.INSTITUTION_NAME, sei.PARENT_INSTITUTION, scu.USER_NAME, scu.LOGIN_NAME, sua.AUDIT_STATUS, sua.AUDIT_TIME FROM STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_ENTITY_INSTITUTION sei LEFT JOIN STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_USER_AUDIT sua ON sei.ID = sua.ENTITY_ID left join STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_COMMON_USER scu on sua.USER_ID = scu.USER_ID WHERE sei.IS_DELETE = 1
and sei.INSTITUTION_NAME like CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{institutionName},'%'))
and sua.AUDIT_STATUS = 0
and sua.AUDIT_STATUS = 2
and (sua.AUDIT_STATUS = 0 or sua.AUDIT_STATUS = 2)
order by sua.AUDIT_TIME desc
